channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ImageInject
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ImageInject

item.title: CVE-2022-4243|2024-08-03T01:34:49.968Z -- unknown -- imageinject
item.description: The ImageInject WordPress plugin through 1.17 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup).
